snippet.title: Official Gameplay Trailer - Upcoming Steampunk ARPG Crystalfall
snippet.description:
Pick a class between mutated characters and embark on a quest through a world devastated by a mysterious asteroid, filled with steampunk enemies and epic loot. Crystalfall is an upcoming hack 'n’ slash Action RPG with randomized dungeons, theorycrafting and lootable skills.

Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2574970/Crystalfall/ 

Follow us on our social media channels for more news and highlights!
💎 https://www.x.com/PlayCrystalfall
💎 https://www.reddit.com/r/Crystalfall/
💎 https://www.facebook.com/PlayCrystalfall
💎 https://www.instagram.com/PlayCrystalfall
💎 https://www.tiktok.com/@PlayCrystalfall
💎Join our Discord channel: https://discord.gg/ntPmauYuKV

#actionrpg #arpg #steampunk #steam #hacknslash
